entries.description: Add support for Kubernetes 1.27.
Add support for Kubernetes 1.24.15, 1.25.11, 1.26.6 and 1.27.3 (fixing CVE-2023-2431, CVE-2023-2727 and CVE-2023-2728).
Add option to disable deployment of default network policies in KubeVirt cluster.
Add support for Canal 3.25.
Add support for Cilium 1.13.3.
VMware Cloud Director now supports authentication using API Token.
Add option to restrict project deletion to admin.
Add indicator of what was changed on editing dialogs.
Add warning message in the cluster list page in case some seeds are not reachable.
Update Metering to v1.0.3 (EE).
Move to Egress based cluster isolation network policies for KubeVirt. Custom Network policies for KubeVirt datacenters might need adjustment.
Update AWS CCM to 1.25.3 / 1.26.1 / 1.27.1.
Update AWS EBS CSI to 2.18.0.
Update Azure Disk CSI to 1.27.1.
Update Azure File CSI to 1.27.0.
Update vSphere CCM/CSI to 1.24.5 / 1.25.2 / 1.26.1.
Update VMware Cloud Director CSI driver to 1.3.2.
Update OpenStack CCM/CSI to 1.25.5 / 1.26.2. Container images are now using `registry.k8s.io` instead of `docker.io`.
Update Digitalocean CCM to 0.1.42.
Update Anexia CCM (cloud-controller-manager) to version 1.5.4.
Update Hetzner CCM to 1.15.0.
Update Hetzner CSI to 2.3.2.
Update Cilium versions to 1.12.9 and 1.11.16.
Update machine-controller to 1.57.0 and operating-system-manager to 1.3.0.
Update KubeOne for external clusters to 1.6.2.
Update Gatekeeper to 3.12.0.
Update Prometheus to 2.43.1.

UI/UX improvements for vSphere credentials in provider settings step: By default, username/password will be configured and dedicated credentials will be used to configure infra management user for vSphere.
Allow removing cluster label when PodNodeSelector admission plugin and clusterDefaultNodeSelector namespace are set.
Improve page responsiveness for smaller screen sizes.
The kubeconfig used by konnectivity's server component gets renewed automatically now, no longer causing konnectivity to stop working when the embedded certificate expires.
Fix storage calculation for Openstack resource quota when custom disk size is provided (EE).
Don't override floating IP settings from user input for OpenStack initial MachineDeployment.
AWS subnets are fetched correctly if credentials are provided directly instead of using a preset.
Fix cluster wizard not selecting a default version if custom versions are configured.
Machine Deployments are initialized without waiting for all cluster details to finish loading.
Show correct health information for Machine Deployments with no replicas.
Deprecate Canal 3.22 and enforce update for Canal below 3.22 on Kubernetes 1.25 and above.
